response.overview: Kostas Gynaikas is a name and a thing. Owner of an insurance company has a passion for women. He squanders the company's money on entertainment in nightclubs in the company of charming beings. Because the situation has reached an impasse his partner makes a plan to make him comply. This is how he agrees with Mr. Pardalea, the owner of the night club. Kostas, without realizing it, will find himself badly involved with Tanya and her sister Aspa..
response.title: O gynaikas
